name: Ortifex
description: The Ortifex is a medium-sized undead creature that cannot walk but can fly and hover. It has the resilience of a significant hit point pool and natural armor.
memorable: Unique abilities like Blood Siphon and Hypnotic Heartbeat make the Ortifex a formidable and controlling presence on the battlefield.
goals: Typically serves as a blood source for nearby creatures like vampires and acts strategically in combat.
relations: Often found with undead allies, particularly bloodsucking creatures such as vampires.
environment: Commonly found in dark, abandoned places or where blood-sucking creatures reside.
strengths: Immune to multiple conditions and possesses blindsight, which grants it excellent tracking and combat capabilities.
weaknesses: Very poor intelligence and average dexterity make it less effective in complex situations.
attacks: Can deliver a melee slam attack causing both bludgeoning and necrotic damage, and has the ability to drain blood from nearby foes.
most_powerful_ability: Hypnotic Heartbeat can incapacitate and charm foes, making them move directly towards the Ortifex.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures in its vicinity even while blind.
additional_information: Can drain blood to heal creatures like vampires.
Can sense blood and locate nearby living creatures.
DC 13 Wisdom save needed to resist being charmed.
Temporary hit points enhance its durability.
